page.title: 08A FAMILY SUNDAY IN ELMSTEAD
page.content: Usually we get up at about 7.30 a.m.We have breakfast and then feed the{pets,}geese and ducks.Sometimes during the Winter months my husband rides in{Pre 1965 British}built {Motorcycle Trials.}We set off at approx 9 a.m.At 10 o'clock we arrive at our destination,which is usually in a wood.We then meet all the competitors. At 10.30 a.m. the Trial begins and each rider is given a number,they set off at 1 minute intervals.At 12.30 we have our lunch break before the afternoon session.The Trials usually finish at about 3 p.m. when the weather is beginning to turn cold and dark. Sometimes during the Summer we go to the{beach}or a{gymkhana,}or we may cut the{lawn}and go for a{walk. } Occasionally we go to the{church.
